description: Grassy-leaved sweet flag (Acorus gramineus 'Oborozuki') is an incredible plant species. It is a low-growing evergreen perennial with upright grass-like foliage that makes a great addition to any garden. Its attractive foliage grows in attractive tufts, and its leaves produce a delicious sweet aroma when crushed. Its blooms are small, inconspicuous, and creamy yellow in color that can be enjoyed for weeks in early summer. This species of Sweet Flag grows best in moist, well-drained soil and can be used as ground cover. It can tolerate both sun and partial shade, making it a great addition to any garden. The Grassy-leaved Sweet Flag is a unique and amazing plant species that can easily be incorporated into any garden for a touch of beauty and fragrance.
